summary.text: As a Front End Developer with eight years of agency experience, I have worked closely with various in-house and external teams. While focusing on user experience and reusability, I have developed and maintained feature-rich web applications for commercial brands, congressional campaigns, and issue advocacy organizations. My co-workers have recognized my work ethic, thorough consideration of project requirements, and ability to provide thoughtful information to non-technical personnel/clients. Development is an ever-evolving process, so quickly learning new skills has been an essential part of my toolbox. I enjoy working on various projects and using appropriate technologies to complete them effectively.

entries.text: As a Freelance Web Developer, I design and develop user-friendly websites, focusing on building custom features to achieve client goals.

While utilizing various web technologies and frameworks, my responsibilities included building mobile responsive websites, micro-sites, and interactive HTML email templates from design comps (PSDs/Sketch). To ensure performance and cross-browser compatibility, I was responsible for testing, debugging, and site maintenance in preparation for client/vendor delivery.

As a team member of the “Digital Channel,” I developed websites for high-profile political candidates, campaigns, and issue advocacy groups. Specifically, I was responsible for writing custom PHP applications, creating/editing graphics, theming WordPress sites and writing custom plugins/widgets. Other responsibilities included testing and maintaining digital assets, as well as collaborating with clients/vendors to define and implement new features.

In my role as a Substitute Teacher for four years, I was responsible for managing the classroom and supporting academic learning. I followed the lesson plans provided by the permanent teacher and assisted students in achieving their learning objectives. I also maintained proper classroom management and encouraged positive behavior to enhance the learning experience.
